column5: I read there are two islands on Lake of the Woods which are identified as Massacre Island. Each has its supporters for being the site of the Massacre. Here is link where I read it:http://www.co.lake-of-the-woods.mn.us/history.htm Ok Rgates and Obabikon, which is it? I know where the one is south of Birch Island, where is the other?
I know of one... I've never heard, prior to this story, of the other one. No clue where it would be.

Yes their are 2 Massacre Islands on LOW Little Massacre over by Garden Island and Massacre Island South and East of Oak Island in Onterio. Great fishing in Late July and Early Augest around Massacre in Onterio.
